May 26, 1959
Dr* Marshall MoLuhsn
Culture and Communications Seminar
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 10, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall t
I hop© you got home safely, and have caught your breath and
caught up on sleep*
Attached is your copy of the contract —- l*e* the part we did
last night* Also some more copies of expense vouchers* Just
sign and return. We'll fill 'em out for you from raw data and
receipts you can send us, and send to our Treasurer for payment.
Whew I
Warmest regards.
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/dp
Enclosures
